item.title: FCA proposes new ratings system for workplace pension schemes
item.description: The City watchdog has proposed new rules to help ensure pension schemes are providing value for money

item.title: Fundsmith underperforms again
item.description: Terry Smith’s actively-managed fund returned less than 1% in 2025, trailing the MSCI World Index for the fifth year in a row

item.title: Review: A cultural tour of North India
item.description: Jessica Sheldon explores North India's food and art scene from three luxurious Leela Palace hotels in New Delhi, Jaipur and Udaipur
